title: Authors and Citation
text: Hadley Wickham. Author, maintainer. . Copyright holder, funder.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Wickham H (2022). nycflights13: Flights Departed NYC 2013. https://nycflights13.tidyverse.org, https://github.com/tidyverse/nycflights13.
code: @Manual{,   title = {nycflights13: Flights that Departed NYC in 2013},   author = {Hadley Wickham},   year = {2022},   note = {https://nycflights13.tidyverse.org, https://github.com/tidyverse/nycflights13}, }

title: Flights that Departed NYC in 2013
text: package contains information flights departed NYC (e.g. EWR, JFK LGA) destinations United States, Puerto Rico, American Virgin Islands) 2013: 336,776 flights total. help understand causes delays, also includes number useful datasets. package provides following data tables. ?flights: flights departed NYC 2013 ?weather: hourly meterological data airport ?planes: construction information plane ?airports: airport names locations ?airlines: translation two letter carrier codes names ’re interested subsets flight data, see: nycflights flights departing NYC last year. anyflights flights departing airport year. airlines maintain local SQL database flight departure data.

title: Airline names — airlines
text: Look airline names carrier codes.

title: Airline names — airlines
text: Data frame columns carrier Two letter abbreviation. name Full name.

title: Airline names — airlines
text: https://www.transtats.bts.gov/DL_SelectFields.asp?Table_ID=236

title: Airline names — airlines
code: airlines #> # A tibble: 16 × 2 #>    carrier name                        #>    <chr>   <chr>                       #>  1 9E      Endeavor Air Inc.           #>  2 AA      American Airlines Inc.      #>  3 AS      Alaska Airlines Inc.        #>  4 B6      JetBlue Airways             #>  5 DL      Delta Air Lines Inc.        #>  6 EV      ExpressJet Airlines Inc.    #>  7 F9      Frontier Airlines Inc.      #>  8 FL      AirTran Airways Corporation #>  9 HA      Hawaiian Airlines Inc.      #> 10 MQ      Envoy Air                   #> 11 OO      SkyWest Airlines Inc.       #> 12 UA      United Air Lines Inc.       #> 13 US      US Airways Inc.             #> 14 VX      Virgin America              #> 15 WN      Southwest Airlines Co.      #> 16 YV      Mesa Airlines Inc.

title: Airport metadata — airports
text: Useful metadata airports.

title: Airport metadata — airports
text: data frame columns: faa FAA airport code. name Usual name airport. lat, lon Location airport. alt Altitude, feet. tz Timezone offset GMT. dst Daylight savings time zone. = Standard US DST: starts second Sunday March, ends first Sunday November. U = unknown. N = dst. tzone IANA time zone, determined GeoNames webservice.

title: Airport metadata — airports
text: https://openflights.org/data.html, downloaded 2014-06-27

title: Airport metadata — airports
code: airports #> # A tibble: 1,458 × 8 #>    faa   name                           lat    lon   alt    tz dst   tzone #>    <chr> <chr>                        <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <chr> <chr> #>  1 04G   Lansdowne Airport             41.1  -80.6  1044    -5 A     Amer… #>  2 06A   Moton Field Municipal Airpo…  32.5  -85.7   264    -6 A     Amer… #>  3 06C   Schaumburg Regional           42.0  -88.1   801    -6 A     Amer… #>  4 06N   Randall Airport               41.4  -74.4   523    -5 A     Amer… #>  5 09J   Jekyll Island Airport         31.1  -81.4    11    -5 A     Amer… #>  6 0A9   Elizabethton Municipal Airp…  36.4  -82.2  1593    -5 A     Amer… #>  7 0G6   Williams County Airport       41.5  -84.5   730    -5 A     Amer… #>  8 0G7   Finger Lakes Regional Airpo…  42.9  -76.8   492    -5 A     Amer… #>  9 0P2   Shoestring Aviation Airfield  39.8  -76.6  1000    -5 U     Amer… #> 10 0S9   Jefferson County Intl         48.1 -123.    108    -8 A     Amer… #> # … with 1,448 more rows  if (require("dplyr")) {  airports %>% rename(dest = faa) %>% semi_join(flights) flights %>% anti_join(airports %>% rename(dest = faa)) airports %>% rename(origin = faa) %>% semi_join(flights)  } #> Loading required package: dplyr #>  #> Attaching package: ‘dplyr’ #> The following objects are masked from ‘package:stats’: #>  #>     filter, lag #> The following objects are masked from ‘package:base’: #>  #>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union #> Joining, by = "dest" #> Joining, by = "dest" #> Joining, by = "origin" #> # A tibble: 3 × 8 #>   origin name                  lat   lon   alt    tz dst   tzone           #>   <chr>  <chr>               <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <chr> <chr>           #> 1 EWR    Newark Liberty Intl  40.7 -74.2    18    -5 A     America/New_Yo… #> 2 JFK    John F Kennedy Intl  40.6 -73.8    13    -5 A     America/New_Yo… #> 3 LGA    La Guardia           40.8 -73.9    22    -5 A     America/New_Yo…

title: Flights data — flights
text: -time data flights departed NYC (.e. JFK, LGA EWR) 2013.

title: Flights data — flights
text: Data frame columns year, month, day Date departure. dep_time, arr_time Actual departure arrival times (format HHMM HMM), local tz. sched_dep_time, sched_arr_time Scheduled departure arrival times (format HHMM HMM), local tz. dep_delay, arr_delay Departure arrival delays, minutes. Negative times represent early departures/arrivals. carrier Two letter carrier abbreviation. See airlines get name. flight Flight number. tailnum Plane tail number. See planes additional metadata. origin, dest Origin destination. See airports additional metadata. air_time Amount time spent air, minutes. distance Distance airports, miles. hour, minute Time scheduled departure broken hour minutes. time_hour Scheduled date hour flight POSIXct date. Along origin, can used join flights data weather data.

title: Flights data — flights
text: RITA, Bureau transportation statistics, https://www.transtats.bts.gov/DL_SelectFields.asp?Table_ID=236

title: Plane metadata — planes
text: Plane metadata plane tailnumbers found FAA aircraft registry. American Airways (AA) Envoy Air (MQ) report fleet numbers rather tail numbers matched.

title: Plane metadata — planes
text: data frame columns: tailnum Tail number. year Year manufactured. type Type plane. manufacturer, model Manufacturer model. engines, seats Number engines seats. speed Average cruising speed mph. engine Type engine.

title: Plane metadata — planes
text: FAA Aircraft registry, https://www.faa.gov/licenses_certificates/aircraft_certification/aircraft_registry/releasable_aircraft_download/

title: Plane metadata — planes
code: planes #> # A tibble: 3,322 × 9 #>    tailnum  year type        manufacturer model engines seats speed engine #>    <chr>   <int> <chr>       <chr>        <chr>   <int> <int> <int> <chr>  #>  1 N10156   2004 Fixed wing… EMBRAER      EMB-…       2    55    NA Turbo… #>  2 N102UW   1998 Fixed wing… AIRBUS INDU… A320…       2   182    NA Turbo… #>  3 N103US   1999 Fixed wing… AIRBUS INDU… A320…       2   182    NA Turbo… #>  4 N104UW   1999 Fixed wing… AIRBUS INDU… A320…       2   182    NA Turbo… #>  5 N10575   2002 Fixed wing… EMBRAER      EMB-…       2    55    NA Turbo… #>  6 N105UW   1999 Fixed wing… AIRBUS INDU… A320…       2   182    NA Turbo… #>  7 N107US   1999 Fixed wing… AIRBUS INDU… A320…       2   182    NA Turbo… #>  8 N108UW   1999 Fixed wing… AIRBUS INDU… A320…       2   182    NA Turbo… #>  9 N109UW   1999 Fixed wing… AIRBUS INDU… A320…       2   182    NA Turbo… #> 10 N110UW   1999 Fixed wing… AIRBUS INDU… A320…       2   182    NA Turbo… #> # … with 3,312 more rows  if (require("dplyr")) {  # Flights that don't have plane metadata flights %>% anti_join(planes, "tailnum")  } #> # A tibble: 52,606 × 19 #>     year month   day dep_time sched_dep_time dep_delay arr_time #>    <int> <int> <int>    <int>          <int>     <dbl>    <int> #>  1  2013     1     1      558            600        -2      753 #>  2  2013     1     1      559            600        -1      941 #>  3  2013     1     1      600            600         0      837 #>  4  2013     1     1      602            605        -3      821 #>  5  2013     1     1      608            600         8      807 #>  6  2013     1     1      611            600        11      945 #>  7  2013     1     1      623            610        13      920 #>  8  2013     1     1      624            630        -6      840 #>  9  2013     1     1      628            630        -2     1137 #> 10  2013     1     1      629            630        -1      824 #> # … with 52,596 more rows, and 12 more variables: sched_arr_time <int>, #> #   arr_delay <dbl>, carrier <chr>, flight <int>, tailnum <chr>, #> #   origin <chr>, dest <chr>, air_time <dbl>, distance <dbl>, hour <dbl>, #> #   minute <dbl>, time_hour <dttm>

title: Hourly weather data — weather
text: Hourly meteorological data LGA, JFK EWR.

title: Hourly weather data — weather
text: data frame columns: origin Weather station. Named origin facilitate merging flights data. year, month, day, hour Time recording. temp, dewp Temperature dewpoint F. humid Relative humidity. wind_dir, wind_speed, wind_gust Wind direction (degrees), speed gust speed (mph). precip Precipitation, inches. pressure Sea level pressure millibars. visib Visibility miles. time_hour Date hour recording POSIXct date.

title: Hourly weather data — weather
text: ASOS download Iowa Environmental Mesonet, https://mesonet.agron.iastate.edu/request/download.phtml.

title: nycflights13 1.0.2
text: CRAN release: 2021-04-12 Fixes R CMD check changes.

title: nycflights13 1.0.1
text: CRAN release: 2019-09-16 airports$tz values \N replaced NA (#36). weather$year weather$month now integers match flights$year flights$month (@jozefhajnala, #34)

title: nycflights13 1.0.0
text: CRAN release: 2018-06-26 weather$time_hour flights$time_hour now stored America/New_York timezone (#19). weather data updated latest Iowa State mesonet (@rmcd1024, #24). wind_gust now correctly captured underlying data, rather copy wind_speed. precip better captures hourly preciptation (tends recorded 51 minutes past hour) (#27)

title: nycflights13 0.2.2
text: CRAN release: 2017-01-27 Import function tibble suppress R CMD check NOTE.

title: nycflights13 0.2.1
text: CRAN release: 2016-12-29 nycflights imports tibble get nice printing even tidyverse package loaded. airports now tzone column contains IANA time zone airport (#15).

title: nycflights13 0.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2016-04-30 airlines: carrier columns characters instead factors (#2). airports: duplicate entry BFT removed (#7). flights: new time_hour variable combines year, month, day, hour single variable (#11). new sched_dep_time sched_arr_time variables give scheduled departure arrival times - appropriate connecting weather data. hour minute now computed scheduled departure time, actual departure time. missing tailnum now recorded NA, "" (#10). weather: Includes weather data airports. New time_hour variable combines year, month, day, hour single POSIXct variable. Saved ungrouped.
